title: madhurAmbAm bhajarE
sahitya:
madhurAmbAm bhajarE rE mAnasa madana janakAdi guruguha sEvita


anupallavi

 madhurApuri nivAsinIm dhaninIm manu kubErAdi manOllAsinIm


caraNam   matanga tanayAm madhukara vENIm mAdha vAdya bhayavara pradAyinIm 
bhakta vishvAsinIm suvAsinIm shrI stavarAjanuti prasAdinIm
